1_1MhL8nWAcuB5YxbhyYgEHNvsToUtQutRVs.body:
you can change your size limit by sliding the 0 button to the left, then change the value of the size limit. by default, it is set to 10 MB. remember to click the save button once you're done. as for what is this size limit thing, it is calculated depending on how many posts/comments you made, and how long for each post/comment.
